Articles.Content:
**Blipper's Conical Command Capsules**

This is just a pre-release awareness page. I will upload a working version once it is finished.

Blipper's Conical Command Capsules is a plugin for KSP which adds new capsules, all of which fully aerodynamic and containing flush extras, such as deploying parachutes, landing lights, deploying gears and retro-boosters
I think this should be moved to Add-on Development.

> 
> **Blipper's Conical Command Capsules**
> This is just a pre-release awareness page. I will upload a working version once it is finished.
> 
> Blipper's Conical Command Capsules is a plugin for KSP which adds new capsules, all of which fully aerodynamic and containing flush extras, such as deploying parachutes, landing lights, deploying gears and retro-boosters

Do you mean capsules with integrated parachutes and stuff?

Well, anything to reduce part count. An early model would be nice too.
Blipper, the best way to generate awareness and continued interest in your add-on would be to periodically upload WIP screenshots and videos.
Even a rough sketch would be nice to see, anyway more command pods are always welcome
